text: Si qi yi dao zhe, an la jiang qu zou tamen de linghun; siqi wei dao zhe, an la ye hui zai shuimian zhong qu zou tamen de linghun. Yi panding siwang zhe, an la jiang ba tamen de linghun liu xia; wei panding siwang zhe, an la jiang qian hui tamen de linghun dao yige dingqi [zhu]. Dui neng sikao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
